SEARCH
Package input

Class InputUtility

java.lang.Object
input.InputUtility
public class InputUtility extends Object
The InputUtility class handles user input in the game. It keeps track of mouse and keyboard events and delegates them to the appropriate game states.

    • getKeyPressed

      public static boolean getKeyPressed(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode keyCode)
      Checks if the specified key is currently pressed.
      Parameters:
      keyCode - the key code to check
      Returns:
      true if the key is pressed, false otherwise

    • setKeyPressed

      public static void setKeyPressed(Game game, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode keyCode, boolean pressed)
      Sets the specified key as pressed and delegates the key press event to the appropriate game state.
      Parameters:
      game - the game instance
      keyCode - the key code that is pressed
      pressed - true if the key is pressed, false if it is released
